spin_seat.description: Spin the seat for easy cleaning access.

adjust_seat.description: Adjust the seat using rotation for optimal seating comfort.

wipe_seat.description: Wipe the seat to maintain hygiene.

rotate_seat_for_easy_clean.description: Rotate the seat clockwise for easy cleaning.

press_seat_light.description: Lightly press the seat to test its softness.

clean_seat_clockwise_rotation.description: Rotate the seat clockwise for easy access and then gently wipe it.

rotate_seat_in_both_directions.description: Rotate the seat both clockwise and anticlockwise to test if it's working correctly.

rotate_and_press_seat.description: Rotate the seat to adjust its position, then press it to confirm its comfort.

wipe_and_press_seat.description: Clean the seat with a cloth, then press it to ensure its dryness and comfort.

press_seat.description: Press the seat with soft cloth to ensure comfort.

clean_seat_with_rotate.description: Rotate the seat for easy cleaning and then wipe it with a clean cloth.

rotate_seat_anti_clockwise.description: Rotate the seat anticlockwise to adjust its position.

rotate_seat_clockwise.description: Rotate the seat clockwise to adjust its position.

rotate_seat.description: Rotate the seat to adjust its posture, but no need to confirm its status in current case.

clean_seat.description: Clean the seat to remove dust or any other particles.

rotate_seat_left.description: Rotate the seat to the left to adjust its angle.

rotate_and_clean_seat.description: Rotate the seat, clean it and then rotate it back to its original position.

buff_leg.description: Buff a cloth over leg surface to remove dust or other particles.

firmly_press_leg.description: Press the leg surface firmly to check for stability.

clean_leg.description: Clean the leg of the chair to keep it shiny.

press_leg_firmly.description: Press the leg of the chair firmly to ensure its stability.

wipe_leg.description: Wipe the leg of the chair to keep it clean.

check_chair_for_dust.description: Check the entire chair for dust by wiping the seat and leg.

check_chair_for_comfort.description: Check the chair for comfort and stability by pressing the seat and leg.

adjust_and_validate_seat.description: Rotate the seat for adjustment and then confirm its position.

general_chair_cleaning.description: Perform a general cleaning of the chair, including seat and leg.

general_check_for_comfort.description: Perform a general comfort check of the chair, including seat and leg.

clean_press_chair.description: Clean the chair surfaces and then firmly press the seat and leg to ensure its stability.

adjust_seat_rotate.description: Adjust the seat position by rotating it.

clean_rotate_chair.description: Clean the chair and rotate the seat to check its flexibility.

press_and_rotate_chair.description: Press both the leg and seat of the chair to test their rigidity, then rotate the seat for a complete check.

clean_and_press_chair.description: Clean the entire chair by wiping both the leg and seat, and then press both parts to ensure they are dry and comfortable.

rotate_wipe_press_leg_and_seat.description: Rotate the seat to check its flexibility, clean both the leg and seat, then press both parts to check for comfort and stability.

wipe_and_check_chair.description: Clean the entire chair and then check its status without needing further confirmation.

clean_complete_chair_after_rotation.description: Rotate the seat for easy cleaning, clean the whole chair including leg and seat together.

press_complete_chair.description: Press the complete chair to ensure its comfort and rigidity.

rotate_clean_press_chair.description: Rotate the seat, clean the entire chair including the leg and seat, and press the complete chair to ensure its comfort and rigidity.

clean_whole_chair.description: Clean the entire chair, wiping both leg and seat together.

clean_chair.description: Clean the entire chair, including both the seat and the leg.

rotate_seat_and_clean_chair.description: Rotate the seat, clean the seat and leg, and set the seat back to its original position for a thorough cleaning.
